RawLine: TNPC_30081013,{color=#FF0000}行至劍鋒驚又險{/color}、{color=#FF0000}命高三重方無憾{/color}。,{color=#FF0000}行至剑锋惊又险{/color}、{color=#FF0000}命高三重方无憾{/color}。

Items.r: {color=#FF0000}行至劍鋒驚又險{/color}、{color=#FF0000}命高三重方無憾{/color}。
Items.c: 行至劍鋒驚又險、命高三重方無憾。
Items.mt: Walking to the edge of the sword is frightening and dangerous, and there is no regret when one's life is three times higher.

Items.r: {color=#FF0000}行至剑锋惊又险{/color}、{color=#FF0000}命高三重方无憾{/color}。
